tool_description: A simple API to remove background from image in seconds
name: Image Background Remover
title: Image Background Remover

api_list.name: API status check
api_list.description: Call this to see if server is up and running.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://image-background-remover13.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "image-background-remover13.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://image-background-remover13.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "image-background-remover13.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
